gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]. Major discrepancy with Meteoblue predicting a sunny day without rain. Meteoblue shows a dry forecast in contrast to the baseline's 72% rain probability. Seems like a perfect day for a café terrace, if you trust Meteoblue.
